title: T206 FOR SALE - ALL PSA/SGC Graded 4, 5, 6, 7oc
author: OldSchoolBaseball

posts.post_title: T206 FOR SALE - ALL PSA/SGC Graded 4, 5, 6, 7oc
posts.post_content:
I have a number of nice T206 available.  FREE SHIPPING!!

Scans are available on request - first come, first served!

PAYPAY (PAYMENT OWED OPTION) or +3%.  Checks are ok as well.  I WILL TAKE TRADES FOR PSA 6's THAT I NEED.

Thanks! David

[url]three4moore@yahoo.com[/url]



Vic Willis, St Louis, throwing, Amazing card - SGC 40 $139

[IMG]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww141/theflyingm/SGCWillisthrowing.jpg[/IMG]
Will take the Durham card. Thank you.
Hello- will take the mitchell psa 7oc. Thanks-kevin,  p.s.- would love to see the chase pink sgc 80
Updated as I removed SOLD cards.  Resonable offers accepted.  PSA 6's really accepted!!
Added a few scans - click the links.
I will take the spike shannon card
I will take Malarkey & Rhoades arm extended. E-mail to follow. Thanks.
Could you please send me a scan of your Joe Lake (no ball) PSA5? Please send to [url]timothy_browne@hotmail.com[/url]     Thank you. Tim
Sorry.....I forgot to add: Could you please send me a scan of your Bunk Congalton PSA5? Please also send it to [url]timothy_browne@hotmail.com[/url]    Thanks again. Tim

Hi David,
I'd be interested in trading a T206 Knight (portrait) PSA 6.  E-mail sent.
Thanks,
--S
I have added a few more scans
Could you sell Fletcher, Milligan, Willis, Schlafly for $500. If not could you sell Fletcher & Milligan for $200.  Thanks.  [url]mpowers23@verizon.net[/url]

Hi David,

           Thanks for sending the scans. I'll take the Congalton and Lake PSA5's. Tim    [url]timothy_browne@hotmail.com[/url]
Congalton and Lake PSA5's received. Very nice cards.  THANK YOU, David.  Tim
